details.title: Temporal coherent adaptive target detection for multi-input multi-output radars in clutter

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electr. & Electron. Eng., Shiraz Univ., Shiraz
authors.name: A. Sheikhi

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electr. & Electron. Eng., Shiraz Univ., Shiraz
authors.name: A. Zamani

details.abstract: The superiority of multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) radars over conventional phased-array radars has been recently shown in many aspects. The MIMO radars have better detection performance and can extract target information more precisely than phased-array radars. The problem of adaptive target detection using temporal coherent pulse train in the presence of nonhomogeneous clutter (different clutter statistics in receivers) is considered for MIMO radars. This problem has been formulated as a hypothesis test. For clutter with unknown statistics three adaptive decision rules have been developed using the generalised likelihood ratio test. The results show the superiority of the MIMO radars with temporal coherent processing over conventional phased arrays in the presence of clutter.

ieee.title: Unified Optimization Framework for Multi-Static Radar Code Design Using Information-Theoretic Criteria
ieee.displayText: Mohammad Mahdi Naghsh, Mahmoud Modarres-Hashemi, Shahram ShahbazPanahi, Mojtaba Soltanalian, Petre Stoica, "Unified Optimization Framework for Multi-Static Radar Code Design Using Information-Theoretic Criteria", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 61, pp. 5401-5416, 2013, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: Adaptive detection for shared-spectrum multistatic radar in Gaussian clutter
ieee.displayText: Lingjiang Kong, Mei Yang, Bin Zhao, "Adaptive detection for shared-spectrum multistatic radar in Gaussian clutter", Radar Conference (RADAR) 2012 IEEE, pp. 0309-0313, 2012, ISSN 1097-5659.

ieee.title: Adaptive detectors for MIMO radar with sidelobe signal rejection capabilities
ieee.displayText: Juting Wang, Shengli Jiang, Jin He, Zhong Liu, Chris Baker, "Adaptive detectors for MIMO radar with sidelobe signal rejection capabilities", Wireless Communications & Signal Processing 2009. WCSP 2009. International Conference on, pp. 1-5, 2009.

ieee.title: Target tracking in pulse-doppler MIMO radar by extended kalman filter using velocity vector
ieee.displayText: M. Jabbarian, H. Khaleghi Bizaki, "Target tracking in pulse-doppler MIMO radar by extended kalman filter using velocity vector", Electrical Engineering (ICEE) 2012 20th Iranian Conference on, pp. 1373-1378, 2012.

ieee.title: Persymmetric adaptive target detection with distributed MIMO radar
ieee.displayText: Jun Liu, Hongbin Li, Braham Himed, "Persymmetric adaptive target detection with distributed MIMO radar", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 51, pp. 372-382, 2015, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Exploiting persymmetry for adaptive detection in distributed MIMO radar
ieee.displayText: Jun Liu, Hongbin Li, Braham Himed, "Exploiting persymmetry for adaptive detection in distributed MIMO radar", Signal Processing Conference (EUSIPCO) 2016 24th European, pp. 2091-2095, 2016, ISSN 2076-1465.

ieee.title: MIMO radar detection and adaptive design in compound-Gaussian clutter
ieee.displayText: Murat Akcakaya, Arye Nehorai, "MIMO radar detection and adaptive design in compound-Gaussian clutter", Radar Conference 2010 IEEE, pp. 236-241, 2010, ISSN 1097-5659.

ieee.title: MIMO radar detection of targets in compound-Gaussian clutter
ieee.displayText: Murat Akcakaya, Martin Hurtado, Arye Nehorai, "MIMO radar detection of targets in compound-Gaussian clutter", Signals Systems and Computers 2008 42nd Asilomar Conference on, pp. 208-212, 2008, ISSN 1058-6393.

ieee.title: Adaptive detection and sidelobe signal rejection for MIMO radar
ieee.displayText: Juting Wang, "Adaptive detection and sidelobe signal rejection for MIMO radar", Radar (Radar) 2011 IEEE CIE International Conference on, vol. 2, pp. 984-988, 2011.

ieee.title: Joint detector and estimator design for widely separated MIMO radars
ieee.displayText: S. Sharify, M. M. Nayebi, "Joint detector and estimator design for widely separated MIMO radars", Radar Methods and Systems Workshop (RMSW) IEEE, pp. 136-140, 2016.
